main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a silvery, fuzzy object that resembled the rear view of a car, noted for its extreme fast speed.
interesting points: The sighting took place on March 20, 1967, in Cheyenne, Wyoming.; The object was described as tear drop shaped and approximately 30 to 40 feet long.; The observer claimed it had a short, white, fuzzy trail and was descending toward the horizon.; Weather conditions were clear with good visibility at the time of the sighting.; The observer's age was 52, and he was described as a clergyman and a college graduate.
sighted object: a silvery, fuzzy, tear drop-shaped object
